item.description:
Note: Even though Meetup.com says we have ~30 attending, the majority do not RSVP through this site, and we regularly have ~100 or more attending. See you there!

Come make reparation to God on Good Friday, the day when Jesus walked and prayed for us. We will walk from Government Center to the Cathedral, 50-100 of us making the stations of the cross at churches along the way. When we reach the Cathedral at 11:30, Cardinal Sean O'Malley will join us for the last 2 Stations of the Cross.

This is our 25th year!

Meet us at 9:00AM at Government Center, on the Cambridge Street side, or meet us at the Cathedral at 11:30. How to find us: Just look for banners and statues.

Take the MBTA to our starting point at Government Center, or drive to our end point at the Cathedral of the Holy Cross, Boston, MA 02118, (617) 574-9637. There is free parking across the street behind the Cathedral. You can take the Silver Line bus stop a few minute's ride to Government Center.

Fr. Tom Carzon of St. Clement's Eucharistic Shrine will lead us.

This is a prayerful procession in reparation for the sin of abortion. Please leave your protest signs and bring your rosaries. 

See you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Just look for banners and statues at Government Center at 9am, or at the Cathedral at 11:30.

group.name: Way of the Cross for Life

item.name: Stations of the Cross at churches in Boston: Good Friday 9AM-12.
